nodes.text: The Khomm system was a star system on the edge of the Deep Core of the galaxy. It contained the fertile planet Khomm, home to the near-human Khommites and four-legged Khommite striders. It was located at Standard Galactic Grid coordinates L-12.

Khomm system was mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the 2015 magazine Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon 36. The system originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it appeared in the 1995 novel Darksaber by Kevin J. Anderson.
